body_html:
Hello @gianks,
I'm guessing you don't see this exact same error with the eigen_sycl branch as the TensorDeviceSycl.h file shouldn't look like that anymore.
Regarding my previous comment, TF 1.9 has now been merged :) As a rule you should always use the latest version of ComputeCpp and of the eigen_sycl branch from the official Codeplay repository. We used bazel 0.16.0, it seems bazel 0.17 and above don't work yet even with the most recent version of TF.
Lastly, we don't support Ubuntu 18.04 nor AmdGpuPro 18.30 but it could always work! If you have any issue please create a ticket in the Codeplay repository.

body:
Hello @gianks,
I'm guessing you don't see this exact same error with the eigen_sycl branch as the TensorDeviceSycl.h file shouldn't look like that anymore.
Regarding my previous comment, TF 1.9 has now been merged :) As a rule you should always use the latest version of ComputeCpp and of the eigen_sycl branch from the [official Codeplay repository](https://github.com/codeplaysoftware/tensorflow). We used bazel 0.16.0, it seems bazel 0.17 and above don't work yet even with the most recent version of TF.
Lastly, we don't support Ubuntu 18.04 nor AmdGpuPro 18.30 but it could always work! If you have any issue please create a ticket in the Codeplay repository.
